name: Sarah Anderson
bio: With over 15 years of experience in luxury interior design, Sarah leads our creative vision with an unwavering commitment to excellence and innovation.

name: Michael Chen
bio: Michael specializes in contemporary residential design, bringing a unique blend of Eastern and Western design philosophies to every project.

name: Emma Laurent
bio: Emma's architectural expertise ensures seamless integration between structure and interior design, creating harmonious living spaces.

name: David Martinez
bio: David leads our commercial projects with a strategic approach that balances brand identity, functionality, and aesthetic appeal.

name: Sophia Williams
bio: Sophia ensures every project is delivered on time and to the highest standards, coordinating all aspects from concept to completion.

name: James Thompson
bio: James brings fresh perspectives and creative solutions to residential and hospitality projects with his keen eye for detail.

name: Olivia Kim
bio: Olivia transforms spaces through innovative lighting design, creating ambiance and highlighting architectural features.

name: Lucas Mueller
bio: Lucas brings designs to life through stunning photorealistic renderings, helping clients visualize their future spaces.
